channel.title: second brain on Hugi's Elephant
channel.description: Recent content in second brain on Hugi's Elephant

item.title: Logseq version 9.10 Smart Merge feature
item.description: Logseq today just (4 hours ago) released Version 9.10 So why am I so excited about this release that I am writing about it? It is because of one feature that I have been waiting for for so long… Smart Merge. Logseq checked all the boxes for me It is my main note taking app, my [[PKM]], and my [[second brain]]. There are so many more great things about Logseq, but when it comes down to the deal breakers these were high on my list and believe me I have tried many apps and I can’t think of any that can do all of these things as well as Logseq.
